column2: Arana: The Heart of the Spider (2005) #5
column6:
Her teammate's at Death's Door, her nemesis wants a showdown, and her best friend is falling for the wrong boy -- if this is Anya's destiny, then she's taking it back to the store! But rejecting her fate might only make matters worse for Anya -- and better for the perfectly evil Sisterhood of the Wasp!,2005,6
32 PGS./Marvel PSR ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Fiona Avery | penciller (cover):Mark Brooks | colorist:Udon Comics | penciller:Roger Cruz | inker:Victor Olazaba | letterer:Rus Wooton
